org.apache.ignite.cache

Class QueryEntity

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.ignite.cache.QueryEntity
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable

    public class QueryEntity
extends Object
implements Serializable
    Query entity is a description of cache entry (composed of key and value) in a way of how it must be indexed and can be queried.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      QueryEntity()
      Creates an empty query entity.
      QueryEntity(String keyType, String valType)
      Creates a query entity with the given key and value types.

      • getFields

        public LinkedHashMap<String,String> getFields()
        Gets query fields for this query pair. The order of fields is important as it defines the order of columns returned by the 'select *' queries.
        Returns:
        Field-to-type map.

      • setFields

        public void setFields(LinkedHashMap<String,String> fields)
        Sets query fields for this query pair. The order if fields is important as it defines the order of columns returned by the 'select *' queries.
        Parameters:
        fields - Field-to-type map.

      • getIndexes

        public Collection<QueryIndex> getIndexes()
        Gets a collection of index entities.
        Returns:
        Collection of index entities.

      • getAliases

        public Map<String,String> getAliases()
        Gets aliases map.
        Returns:
        Aliases.

      • setAliases

        public void setAliases(Map<String,String> aliases)
        Sets mapping from full property name in dot notation to an alias that will be used as SQL column name. Example: {"parent.name" -> "parentName"}.
        Parameters:
        aliases - Aliases map.

      • setIndexes

        public void setIndexes(Collection<QueryIndex> idxs)
        Sets a collection of index entities.
        Parameters:
        idxs - Collection of index entities.

        Utility method for building query entities programmatically.

               QueryIndexType idxType)
        Ensures that index with the given name exists.
        Parameters:
        idxName - Index name.
        idxType - Index type.

      • defaultIndexName

        public static String defaultIndexName(QueryIndex idx)
        Generates default index name by concatenating all index field names.
        Parameters:
        idx - Index to build name for.
        Returns:
        Index name.
